reviewText: My girls are ages 9 and 10, they love all things that are Sonic.  They say all the Sonic shows they have watched are funny to them.  This disc includes these episodes:  Momma Robotnik's Birthday, Robotnik Jr., Sonic The Matchmaker, and Momma Robotnik Returns.
I have majority of movies for my 5 year old and she won't stop watching it. Highly recommend
I bought this movie for my 5 year old kids whose going through a Sonic phase of his life :) It keeps him occupied on our long jurney everyday to & from school/work
